actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide cost-of-living increases in benefits computed under the special minimum primary insurance amount formula, the same as in the case of other monthly benefits payable under such title.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide cost-of-living increases in benefits computed under the special minimum primary insurance amount formula.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide cost-of-living increases in benefits computed under the special minimum primary insurance amount formula, the same as in the case of other monthly benefits payable under such title.
